title: anyone else joining into game lobby very late and not being able to chose a lane?
body: anyone having this problem and all lanes being picked and being pushed into a lane?

replies.body:
If you're always getting into the lobby later than everyone else, you might want to check your connection to make sure it is set up optimally. Check out the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

With the [new Champion Select coming](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/new-champ-select-replaces-team-builder) this will not be an issue for the most part. It will be rolled out for NA and TR first, and the other servers afterwards. Initially it will be available for Normal Draft and Ranked Draft, so try them out! Blind Pick will eventually have a version as well.
